history.content:
Looking for a tech role for this upcoming summer? The UCB Global Startup Fair, hosted by CSUA, HKN, and IEEE, offers students a unique opportunity to discover and interact with small tech companies that typically rely on personal connections for hiring. It is a great way for independent and entrepreneurial students to explore the challenges and excitement of working in a close-knit startup environment.


The in-person fair will take place on Tuesday, April 12 from 10 AM to 3 PM PST in Pauley Ballroom, MLK Student Union. No registration for students is required!
The online fair will take place via Zoom from 10 AM - 3 PM PST on Wednesday, April 13th. Students will need to RSVP for this part of the fair here: https://www.ucbstartupfair.com/ .


Attending companies can be found here. For any questions, please email globalstartupfair@berkeley.edu or join the Startup Fair Discord
history.subject: UC Berkeley Startup Fair 2022
